alert.note: Alert for Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:23AM CDT until April 05 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Butler County in south central Alabama... Central Monroe County in south central Alabama... Crenshaw County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... Conecuh County in south central Alabama... Northern Covington County in south central Alabama... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1023 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of Pine Apple to 12 miles west of Georgiana to 6 miles north of Uriah, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Monroeville, Evergreen, Luverne, Frisco City, Peterman, Georgiana, Brantley, McKenzie, Excel, Red Level, Rutledge, Beatrice, Dozier, Repton, Gantt, Glenwood, Pine Apple, Petrey and I65 And US 84. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Monroe; Wilcox
